IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO IMPROVE LIVES BY MOBILIZING THE CARING POWER OF COMMUNITY TO ADVANCE THE COMMON GOOD.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO IMPROVE LIVES BY MOBILIZING THE CARING POWER OF COMMUNITY TO ADVANCE THE COMMON GOOD. GREATER OTTAWA COUNTY UNITED WAY SUPPORTS, DEVELOPS, AND IMPLEMENTS A RANGE OF IMPACT SOLUTIONS THAT IMPROVE LIVES AND CREATES STRONGER COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.Desc: ALLOCATED FUNDS TO 43 NONPROFIT AGENCIES FUNDING 52 DIFFERENT PROGRAMS. THIS SERVED 105,603 UNDUPLICATED CLIENTS WITHIN OTTAWA COUNTY AND ALLEGAN COUNTY AND LEVERAGED AN ADDITIONAL $201,128 IN FUNDING WITHIN THE COUNTY. GREATER OTTAWA COUNTY UNITED WAY IS A LOCAL PARTNER THAT DRIVES MEASURABLE, LASTING IMPACT THROUGH PROGRAMS INITIATIVES AND COLLABORATIVES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: GREATER OTTAWA COUNTY UNITED WAY HAD 7,003 VOLUNTEERS WHO CONTRIBUTED 56,634 HOURS OF TIME LEVERAGING $1,800,961 IN DONATED SERVICES WITHIN OTTAWA COUNTY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: SUCCESSFUL IMPLEMENTATION OF LAKESHORE HOUSING ALLIANCE AS A PROGRAM OF UNITED WAY; LEVERAGING $1.6 MILLION DOLLARS IN STATE AND FEDERAL GRANTS FOR HOMELESS SERVICES; MANAGEMENT OF THE HOMELESS MANAGEMENT INFORMATION SYSTEM, A COUNTYWIDE DATABASE FOR DATA RELATED TO PERSONS EXPERIENCING HOMELESSNESS; FACILITATION OF THE LAKESHORE HOUSING ALLIANCE STRATEGIC PLAN TO END HOMELESSNESS.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: PROVIDING STAFFING SUPPORT TO OTHER ORGANIZATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AUDITING FIRM PREPARES THE FORM 990. THE 990 IS OVERVIEWED UPON COMPLETION BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND THE CFO PRIOR TO BEING FILED ELECTRONICALLY BY THE AUDITING FIRM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY/QUESTIONNAIRE IS DISTRIBUTED ANNUALLY TO ALL ADMINISTRATORS, VOLUNTEERS AND STAFF IN ORDER TO IDENTIFY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. THESE DOCUMENTS ARE KEPT ON FILE AT THE UNITED WAY OFFICE IN ORDER TO ASSURE THE BOARD THAT SUCH CONFLICTS DO NOT DIMINISH THE ACHIEVEMENT OF THE MISSION AND OBJECTIVES OF UNITED WAY. VOLUNTEERS, STAFF AND REPRESENTATIVES ARE ENCOURAGED TO SEEK GUIDANCE FROM THE ETHICS OFFICER, BOARD, STAFF ETHICS OFFICER OR DESIGNEE CONCERNING THE INTERPRETATION OR APPLICATION OF THE CODE OF ETHICS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION FOR THE ORGANIZATION'S EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR INCLUDES REVIEW AND APPROVAL BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD (INDEPENDENT PERSONS), COMPARABILITY DATA, AND DOCUMENTATION OF THE DELIBERATION PROCESS, THE DECISION AND THE BASIS FOR ITS DECISIONS. THE PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION FOR THE ORGANIZATION'S KEY EMPLOYEES INCLUDES REVIEW AND APPROVAL BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR (INDEPENDENT PERSON), COMPARABILITY DATA, AND DOCUMENTATION OF THE DELIBERATION PROCESS, THE DECISION AND THE BASIS FOR THE DECISIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC VIA THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE AND UPON REQUEST.

VISION: ALL INDIVIDUALS IN OTTAWA COUNTY ACHIEVE THEIR FULL HUMAN POTENTIAL VALUE PROPOSITION: UNITED WAY IS A LOCAL PARTNER THAT DRIVES MEASURABLE LASTING IMPACT THROUGH PROGRAMS, INITIATIVES AND COLLABORATIVES IN THE AREAS OF EDUCATION, FINANCIAL STABILITY AND HEALTH. IMPACT STRATEGY: SUPPORT, DEVELOP AND IMPLEMENT A RANGE OF IMPACT SOLUTIONS (IN DATA DRIVEN ISSUE AREAS) THAT IMPROVES LIVES AND BUILDS STRONGER COMMUNITIES. ENGAGEMENT STRATEGY: WE PROVIDE IMPACTFUL AND MEANINGFUL OPPORTUNITIES TO ENGAGE IN BUILDING STRONG COMMUNITIES.
